7.6 The DATE module

<day-of-week>

Type

Summary

The days of the week.

Equivalent

one-of(#"Sunday", #"Monday", #"Tuesday", #"Wednesday",
       #"Thursday", #"Friday", #"Saturday")

Supertypes

None.

Init-keywords

None.

Library

system

Module

date

Description

The days of the week. This is the type of the return value of the date-day-of-week function.

Operations

date-day-of-week

See also

date-day-of-week, page 136

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
